title: Archpriest

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Contact a player each night. You may send them a <200 character message. This ability resolves immediately.
- Pray to the sun during the day. You may send a <200-character message to any number of players who don’t have any votes for them and whom you’ve contacted previously.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All messages sent by you appear to be sent by “The Voice of the Sun”.
- Whenever you send a non-Partisan player a second message through either of your abilities, they may choose to gain one use of 1074: Ritualist’s ability. If they do, you learn that they did so as well as their role, and, for the rest of the game, you may see their night targets as they choose them.
- Players killed by abilities you give appear to have been killed by an 2440: Archpriest’s follower.

desc:
Post 2440
*In the beginning, there was naught. Then from the horizon rose the sun.*
